name: Hogwarts RPG
description:
Something strange is happening in Hogwarts. The Ministry of Magic calls for your aid!

There is a mystery that must be solved in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. There are delicious cursed candies over all the castle! However, they are dangerous for the students, and Albus Dumbledore requested an investigation. You are a team of detectives sent by the Ministry of Magic to put an end to this situation!

 Characteristics

Explore Hogsmeade and Hogwarts, and visit London for locations as the Diagon Alley and the Ministry of Magic. You can also visit Azkaban.

You can learn spells from the teachers! There are many spells, in four categories, named as Magic Spells, Combat Spells, Special Spells and Forbidden Spells.

Find all the Wizard Cards spread over all the castle! You will need certain spells to open the chests.

Create potions! The ingredients can be found in the Forbidden Forest, but beware! There are spiders roaming around!

The Cursed Candies

Someone known as the Cursed One has been spreading cursed candies over all the castle. Meet Albus Dumbledore inside Hogwarts, and collect all the flying cursed candies of the castle. But the task doesn’t end there, because the Cursed One is hidden somewhere in the castle, and you have the task to find him!

Hogsmeade: explore this beautiful snowy village and the surroundings. Your home is in this place.

Hogwarts: explore the whole castle, from the Exterior Grounds to the very top of the Towers! There are many secrets to discover!

London: this location allows you to access to the Ministry of Magic, the Diagon Alley and King’s Cross Station.

Azkaban: a challenge area full of dementors to test your combat skills!

 Release Notes

Class: Wizard.

Apparition Skills: Apparition to World, Apparition to Hogsmeade, Apparition to Hogwarts, Apparition to London.

Spells: unlock many spells. Many are needed to open chests to collect wizard cards, while others are interesting for combat. There are four categories of spells, and many of them are taught by teachers or other characters.

Potions: you can create potions in the Potions Classroom. These potions have effects, but they are also interesting to make to earn quick money. The ingredients can be collected in the Forbidden Forest.

Wizard Card: the famous wizard cards can be found in chests spread over all the castle, including some in the grounds. Most of the chests require certain spells to be opened.

Cursed Candy: the flying spheres over all the castle are the cursed candies, and they must be collected.

Combat: you can experience turn based combat in three places.

Trophies: there are five trophies. Complete them all and talk with Albus Dumbledore to obtain a powerful wand!
